public class FileUnderConstructionFeature
extends Object

    Feature for under-construction file.

      (package private) void cleanZeroSizeBlock(INodeFile f, INode.BlocksMapUpdateInfo collectedBlocks)
      When deleting a file in the current fs directory, and the file is contained in a snapshot, we should delete the last block if it's under construction and its size is 0.

        void cleanZeroSizeBlock(INodeFile f,

        When deleting a file in the current fs directory, and the file is contained in a snapshot, we should delete the last block if it's under construction and its size is 0.
